definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: priesthood;—abs. ´[[כ]] Ex 29:9 + 5 t.; cstr. [[כְּהֻנַּת]] Nu 25:13 + 2 t.; sf. [[כְּהֻנַּתְכֶם]] Nu 18:1, Nu 18:7, Nu 18:7; [[כְּהֻנׇּתָם]] Nu 3:10; pl. [[כְּהֻנּוֹת]] 1Sa 2:36.—[[כהנת]] [[יהוה]] priesthood of ´[[י]], the portion of the Levites Jos 18:7 (D); pl. priest's offices 1Sa 2:36; elsewhere Ex 29:9, Ex 40:15, Nu 3:10, Nu 16:10, Nu 18:1, Nu 18:7, Nu 18:7, Nu 25:13 (all P), Ezr 2:62 = Ne 7:64, Ne 13:29, Ne 13:29.
